cause.description:
WORLD ORPHANS is a non-profit Christian charity committed to the rescue of millions of orphaned and abandoned children, the strengthening of thousands of indigenous churches, and the impacting of hundreds of communities in the developing world...through orphan prevention and delay involvements, family-style residential solutions, transition projects and self-sustainability programs.

www.worldorphans.org

Read Paul Myhill's blog at: www.abandoned-orphaned.com


1. PROBLEM: 10's of millions orphans in the world today 2. PROBLEM: 100 million + street children 3. SOLUTION: Hundreds of thousands of churches positioned among these children to rescue and care for them 4. ACTION: Match churches here with churches there to better resource and equip indigenous churches for the task 5. We have funded over 500 projects in more than 50 countries!
cause.name: WORLD ORPHANS
